text: Sergej Schmik (born 27 November 1989) is a German footballer who plays as a full-back for and is assistant manager of SC Verl. He has played in the 2. Bundesliga with SC Paderborn 07. ==Career== After starting his career at SC Paderborn 07, Schmik joined SV Wilhelmshaven in the summer of 2012. He left Wilhemshaven in January 2013 to join SV Meppen. In the summer of 2014, he signed for Hessen Kassel. After making over 100 appearances for the club over a four-year period, Schmik signed for SC Verl in summer 2018. In 2020 Schmik became the assistant manager at SC Verl alongside his playing duties. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:People from Pavlodar Category:SC Paderborn 07 players Category:SV Wilhelmshaven players Category:SV Meppen players Category:KSV Hessen Kassel players Category:SC Verl players Category:2. Bundesliga players Category:Regionalliga players
title: Sergej Schmik
